DOC.criteria: Be 40 65 year age . Have normal/correctedtonormal monocular acuity well 20/25 eye . Have pupil diameter regular light â‰¥ 2.5 mm . Willing able wear multifocal contact lenses eye . Have current optical prescription ( obtain less 2 year ago ) . Have spherical equivalent correction equal high 1.00 Diopter equal less +0.50 Diopter .
